subject: Dear Respectfully,
body:
Dear Respectfully,
I have a client who has money to invest either in the form of a loan
or equity basis.
A skilled and competent manager who have a secured and sustainable
business plan that can generate good profits, is required.
Please respond with your thoughts so that we can discuss them.
Regards,
Armando Sizwe.

subject: Re: Dear Respectfully,
body:
Dear Armando Sizwe,

Thank you for your email. I am interested in discussing this opportunity further. Could you please provide more details about the investment, such as the amount of money your client is willing to invest and the type of business they are interested in? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deirdre
